title: Topic 002 Question 015
body: You have an app named App1 that uses two on-premises Microsoft SQL Server databases named DB1 and DB2.
You plan to migrate DB1 and DB2 to Azure
You need to recommend an Azure solution to host DB1 and DB2. The solution must meet the following requirements:
✑ Support server-side transactions across DB1 and DB2.
✑ Minimize administrative effort to update the solution.
options: two Azure SQL databases in an elastic pool
two databases on the same Azure SQL managed instance
two databases on the same SQL Server instance on an Azure virtual machine
two Azure SQL databases on different Azure SQL Database servers
